name: Apple's new ad for the iPad Pro is pure genius

content.html: Many techies I know will lament the message as a diminishing of curiosity for computing, but I think the continuing push of personal computing devices into the hands of more and more people will drive additional curiosity, creating a whole new generation of technologists.
content.value: Many techies I know will lament the message as a diminishing of curiosity for computing, but I think the continuing push of personal computing devices into the hands of more and more people will drive additional curiosity, creating a whole new generation of technologists.
